name: Minecraft Comes Alive: Rewoven
description:
No more ugly nosed villagers! The original mod, ported to Minecraft Fabric 1.16 and above! 
 This rewoven version of MCA offers: 
 Villagers updated to work like 1.14 Village and Pillage changes! 
 Several improvements in stability and features 
 Merges MCA 5 and MCA 6 features into one mod, full of nostalgia AND innovation! 

 Enjoy this mod, and give a thanks to WildBama for letting me port MCA to fabric!
